panel.label: 通知

panel.panel.string: Notices let you send a message and an optionally attached item. Notices only go to group members in Roles with the ability to receive Notices. You can turn off Notices on the General tab.
panel.text: Notices are kept for 14 days. Maximum 200 per group daily
